https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A satire about the afterlife and the greatest mystery of all - show business! God is the Almighty Producer directing his headstrong angels. Representing unruly earthlings, the flamboyant angel Mark exasperates the Almighty while on assignment. Angels, Devils and Men
